item.title: Using Ramda Map with async calls
Using ramda to fill react components
item.description: Ramda is swiss toolbox of javascript functional programming. I have decided to use it in order to greatly simplify the way I am managing data processing. As I was building Zeistab, I came across two challenges. The first was related to fetching data asynchronisally, while needing to wait for all to be fetched. I discussed it in detail in my post on Fetching
